title: DOJ moves to drop charges against former GOP lawmaker in case criticized by Trump
summary: The Justice Department moved to dismiss criminal charges against former Representative Jeff Fortenberry (R-NE), who was accused of lying to federal agents about accepting illegal campaign donations from a Nigerian billionaire
